original_title: Prasanna says Opposition enjoyed murder of an MP
original_body_lines: Minister of Urban Development and Housing Prasanna Ranatunga today charged that the Opposition had enjoyed the murder of a Member of Parliament.
The Minister was responding to a comment by MP Chaminda Wijesiri on the violence that had erupted on May 9, 2022, during which MP Amarakeerthi Athukorala was killed.
Meanwhile, a minute's silence was observed in the parliament today, a year since the assassination of former Polonnaruwa district MP Athukorala.
